call_title: Ergo PoW Dev Update Feb 24th 2025 |  Wallet, Node, Reputation, Mining, Rosen Bridge, and more!

topics.title: Opening and Recent Hack Discussion
topics.summary: Opening remarks addressing the recent $1.4 billion hack and how it validates Ergo's resilient design philosophy. Discussion emphasizes Ergo's built-in protections like storage rent and demurrage compared to vulnerable multi-sig protocols.

topics.title: Sigmanauts Mining DAO Deep Dive
topics.summary: Detailed overview of Sigmanauts mining DAO as a unique community-controlled mining pool. Features include storage rent collection, governance voting, bonus token distributions, and various community channels for miners.

topics.title: Nautilus Wallet Beta Release Progress
topics.summary: AnonBR reports major progress on Nautilus wallet redesign with main interface ported to new design system. Beta release expected next week with support for multiple recovery phrase lengths and improved wallet views.

topics.title: Node 6.0 and SigmaUSD Oracle Updates
topics.summary: Kushti reports final audit and code cleaning for Node 6.0 release with input blocks and fork resolution improvements. SigmaUSD Oracle pool updated to version 2 with new DORT reward tokens for oracle operators.

topics.title: Dexy Gold DEX Alpha and Development
topics.summary: C8 provides update on Dexy Gold alpha UI with ETA of end of next week. Swap functionality completed with history, mempool integration, and ErgoPay features in development.

topics.title: AI Smart Contract Generation Project
topics.summary: Mark's Sharknet project funded with 190 ERG to develop LLM for generating Ergo smart contracts. Vision includes prompt-based smart contract creation with verification capabilities for simplified development.

topics.title: Node Explorer and Rosen Bridge Updates
topics.summary: Node explorer adds pop-ups for DEX and bridge events. Rosen Bridge completes testing and goes live with Watcher v2 updates, including improved observation services and responsive design improvements.

topics.title: Closing and Community Resources
topics.summary: Call wrap-up emphasizing importance of updating Rosen Bridge watchers and promoting community participation in Sigmanauts mining pool and MewFinance liquidity provision.
